partFirstByte.description: The integer value of the first byte of the layer part.

partLastByte.description: The integer value of the last byte of the layer part.

registryId.description: The AWS account ID associated with the registry that you are uploading layer parts to. If you do not specify a registry, the default registry is assumed.

repositoryName.description: The name of the repository that you are uploading layer parts to.

uploadId.description: The upload ID from a previous InitiateLayerUpload operation to associate with the layer part upload.
